ISSUE.TITLE: Magnific Popup Gallery Issue
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.1 Steps to reproduce the problem: Upload several images to a product. Enable picture zoom in store settings. Go to that product and click on a picture, there is no way to scroll through the pictures either using the keyboard. No left or right icons show up either. I see under the magnificPopup settings that gallery is enabled, however it doesn't seem to do anything. You can even see it on the default store (example: http://demo.nopcommerce.com/build-your-own-computer). It should behave like it shows here http://dimsemenov.com/plugins/magnific-popup/ (under gallery examples). Thanks
